string.value: A request came in from #b#p2020011##k. A request from him? Must be because of my last job...

#p2020011# said it had to do with finding an item. He didn't tell me what it is or why he needs it.... Since it's coming from #p2020011# I guess I'll just do it but I wonder what this is all about? Anyway, let's go to #b#p9040002##k at the Excavation Site.
#p9040002# seemed very anxious. What exactly does he want? I should press on, maybe I'll find out...
Long time no see. You finally became a Shadower after the 4th job advancement. If you become a Shadower, you can do anything. Will you accept my request?
You accepted it, but look puzzled. No time to explain. Go to see #b#p9040002##k of #brelics sites#k. He will tell you more!
Why? Are you afraid? I heard you completed the 4th job advancement...nothing should stand in your way now!

You are the one #p2020011# sent. You don't look like a person who can do this kind of thing. This is very dangerous. Although I've been working on the relics for a long time, I can't even guarantee the success of this mission.
I Say again. It is dangerous. I thought #p2020011# will do this. Hmm. Talk to me when you're ready.
This is a request from #b#p9040002##k of the relics excavation team. #p9040002# will tell you in detail. Keep in mind that our customer wants us to do it secretly.
